data.name: Smilegate Viet Name
data.address: 665, Dien Bien Phu, Binh Thanh, Tp.HCM
data.description: Smilegate is a Mega Value Innovator in Entertainment headquartered in Korea, since its foundation in 2002, Smilegate has continuously strived for happier lives and a more hopeful society by developing and providing quality games and content. Smilegate operates businesses in areas of game development and services, investments, and social contributions; develops and discovers various games and cultural content; and provides them as global services by increasing their value. The representative game is CROSSFIRE that worldâ€™s no.1 online FPS game with more than 670 million players from 80 countries, has surprising records such as having over 8 million concurrent users, has reached $10.5 billion sales revenue since its global launch.
data.shortDescription: Entering the Vietnam market from 2023, Smilegate Vietnam's mission is to provide stable development & operation of the Smilegate platform and services, expanding beyond the development center to the region and expanding into an Asian hub.
